alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 09 at 9:04AM PDT until September 10 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Hot conditions continue with temperatures up to 92. Strong east winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Excessive Heat Warning, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the High Wind Warning, until midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.
